translation.en: is that it has to be clean.
translation.zh: 它必须是真实的

translation.en: That competition is real. It's not fake, it's not a setup.
translation.zh: 那必须是真实的竞技而非事先安排好的虚假表演

translation.en: But the players broke that bone.
translation.zh: 但那些球员打破了这条底线

translation.en: That's dangerous.
translation.zh: 这很危险

translation.en: [in Hindi] Whoever messes with us won't be spared.
translation.zh: 绝不放过欺骗我们的人

translation.en: [in English] We wanted to look at,
translation.zh: 我们想看看

translation.en: can we register a criminal case against anybody?
translation.zh: 能否追究任何人的刑事责任

translation.en: So we took an opinion from three retired Supreme Court judges.
translation.zh: 所以我们征求了最高法院三名退休法官的意见

translation.en: Although betting is illegal in India,
translation.zh: 虽然赌博在印度是违法的

translation.en: unfortunately, match-fixing is not a criminal offense
translation.zh: 但遗憾的是 比赛造假并非刑事犯罪

translation.en: and so I was personally dissatisfied
translation.zh: 所以我们不能对这些人

translation.en: that we couldn't take criminal action against these guys.
translation.zh: 提起刑事诉讼 我对此十分不满

translation.en: [Ugra] I know many who stopped watching cricket after that.
translation.zh: 我知道很多人在事发后就不再观看板球比赛了

translation.en: They just gave up. Didn't care.
translation.zh: 他们放弃了 不在乎了

translation.en: So, the only way for Indian cricket to return to its equilibrium
translation.zh: （板球委员会惩罚涉事球员） 印度板球界要想恢复平静

translation.en: was for the cricket board to take action against cricketers that were involved.
translation.zh: 板球委员会就必须惩戒涉事球员

translation.en: [reporter] The board is expected to deal severely with those implicated by the CBI report.
translation.zh: 人们期望委员会严肃处理中央调查局的报告中涉及的所有人员

translation.en: Cricketing world had to say to its fans,
translation.zh: 板球界的管理者必须向球迷们表态

translation.en: "No, no, no. We'll not brook any nonsense."
translation.zh: “不 我们绝不容忍任何人胡作非为

translation.en: "We will nip it in the bud."
translation.zh: 我们会把一切扼杀在萌芽状态”

translation.en: That was one of the reasons Azhar had to be made an example out of.
translation.zh: 这正是他们必须用阿兹鲁丁来杀鸡儆猴的原因之一

translation.en: He had to be hanged publicly
translation.zh: 他必须被公开处刑

translation.en: to reassure everybody that the cricketing story is fine
translation.zh: 以安抚民众别太在意板球比赛的丑闻

translation.en: and Azhar was an aberration.
translation.zh: 阿兹鲁丁只是个例

translation.en: [reporter] In the case of former captain Mohammed Azharuddin,
translation.zh: （M阿兹鲁丁） 在前队长穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁一案中

translation.en: the finding is that he had a nexus with bookies like M.K Gupta
translation.zh: 调查发现他与MK古普塔等赌坊庄家有关联

translation.en: and that he was involved in match-fixing.
translation.zh: 并参与了比赛造假

translation.en: Mohammed Azharuddin
translation.zh: 穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁… （AC穆塔亚板球委员会主席）

translation.en: is debarred from playing any cricket matches
translation.zh: …已被取消所有板球比赛的参赛资格

translation.en: conducted or authorized by ICC, BCCI for life.
translation.zh: 终身不得参加国际板球理事会和印度板球委员会主办或授权的比赛

translation.en: That's the saddest moment for Indian cricket.
translation.zh: 那是印度板球界最悲伤的时刻

translation.en: Saddest moment for Indian cricket.
translation.zh: 印度板球界最悲伤的时刻

translation.en: Azhar was like, "The person, the cricketer."
translation.zh: 阿兹鲁丁曾是板球界的代表人物

translation.en: So playing under him was something great.
translation.zh: 在他的带领下打球是非常光荣的事

translation.en: He lived by example, led by example.
translation.zh: 他以身作则 是球员的表率

translation.en: He is a fighter. He didn't wanted to lose.
translation.zh: 他是一名斗士 他的目标只有赢

translation.en: So, I never believed it.
translation.zh: 我从来不相信那桩丑闻

translation.en: I never believed it because Azhar couldn't do that.
translation.zh: 我从来不信因为阿兹鲁丁做不出那种事

translation.en: [Krishnan] Azhar was holed up in Hyderabad.
translation.zh: 阿兹鲁丁隐藏在海得拉巴城中

translation.en: He went into hiding.
translation.zh: 他躲了起来

translation.en: He was drawn into a shell.
translation.zh: 缩进了壳里

translation.en: I was the only journalist that Azharuddin spoke to.
translation.zh: 我是唯一一个采访到了阿兹鲁丁的记者

translation.en: That drive to Banjara was, uh, definitely nervous.
translation.zh: 开往班加拉的路上 我很紧张

translation.en: This is my first occasion meeting the man.
translation.zh: 那是我第一次见他

translation.en: Would he be hostile?
translation.zh: 他会对我抱有敌意吗？

translation.en: Would he develop cold feet?
translation.zh: 他会临阵退缩吗？

translation.en: Those thoughts were playing on my mind.
translation.zh: 那些想法一直在我脑海中盘旋

translation.en: He asked me for lunch.
translation.zh: 他邀我共进午餐

translation.en: He gave me chicken biryani.
translation.zh: 他给了我鸡肉炖饭

translation.en: And after which, uh, we sat down for the interview.
translation.zh: 然后我们坐下来 我开始采访他

translation.en: He said that it would be grossly unfair to put the blame on him squarely.
translation.zh: 他说直接把一切全怪罪于他太不公平了

translation.en: He thought that the problem was even bigger.
translation.zh: 他觉得其实问题要严重得多

translation.en: But the larger point he was trying to send out,
translation.zh: 但他更想传达的重点是

translation.en: he kept protesting loudly that he was not involved,
translation.zh: 他一直强烈抗议 说他并未参与造假

translation.en: that he was being made a scapegoat.
translation.zh: 而是被当成了替罪羊

translation.en: He kept telling me that he would ride the storm…
translation.zh: 他不断重复着 他一定会渡过难关…

translation.en: and he would come out triumphant.
translation.zh: …荣耀归来

translation.en: He actually thought
translation.zh: 他真的认为

translation.en: the ban would be lifted if he successfully contested it.
translation.zh: 只要他抗辩成功 禁赛令就会被撤销

translation.en: [Ramakanth Reddy] Being a lawyer is my passion, my love.
translation.zh: 我热爱律师这个职业对它充满了热情

translation.en: I've been practicing law for the last 30 years.
translation.zh: 过往30年 我一直在从事法律工作

translation.en: Now, after the life ban was imposed,
translation.zh: 被勒令终身禁赛后

translation.en: Azhar came to me and said,
translation.zh: 阿兹鲁卡来找我说

translation.en: [in Hindi] "Do something about it."
translation.zh: “请帮我想想办法”

translation.en: [in English] We have a CBI report which I read, reread and went on reading.
translation.zh: 我反复阅读了中央调查局的报告

translation.en: Right from the beginning, everything was not in order.
translation.zh: 从一开始 调查程序就很不妥当

translation.en: See, the whole enquiry is based on hearsay.
translation.zh: 整个调查都是基于道听途说展开的 （怀疑他有份参与）

translation.en: What Ajay Sharma says, or what, uh, Manoj Prabhakar says.
translation.zh: 不是阿杰沙玛或者马诺吉普拉哈克的一面之词

translation.en: Or Mukesh Kumar Gupta.
translation.zh: （他听说） 就是穆凯什古普塔的供词

translation.en: He had lot of endorsements and lakhs of rupees coming in.
translation.zh: 他有很多代言和数十万卢比的收入

translation.en: He never had any assets
translation.zh: 他的所有资产都跟他

translation.en: disproportionate to the known sources of income.
translation.zh: 已知的收入水平相称

translation.en: So how can we give credence to this whole report?
translation.zh: 所以我们如何能相信这份报告？

translation.en: There is not a single photograph, not a single video clipping, nothing.
translation.zh: 报告里没有提供任何照片或视频 没有任何佐证

translation.en: It's very bad.
translation.zh: 这非常糟糕

translation.en: You are saying that you never did anything wrong.
translation.zh: 你是说 你没有任何违规行为

translation.en: It's complete rubbish, the match-fixing allegations.
translation.zh: 那些造假指控纯属无稽之谈

translation.en: -I think so. -But they said
translation.zh: 我认为是的 但他们说你承认了某些造假罪行…

translation.en: you admitted to some of the match-fixing stuff and…
translation.zh: 但他们说你承认了某些造假罪行…

translation.en: No. Because I have no chargesheet from any agency.
translation.zh: 不 我没有收到任何机构的犯罪指控

translation.en: -So unless-- -But nor has your name been cleared.
translation.zh: -所以除非…-但你也没有洗脱嫌疑

translation.en: Hopefully, it will be cleared.
translation.zh: 希望将来我能平反昭雪

translation.en: Azharuddin completely denied that he'd ever told the CBI
translation.zh: 阿兹鲁丁全然否认自己曾向中央调查局供认过

translation.en: anything that was stated in the CBI report.
translation.zh: 调查报告中提及的罪状

translation.en: But after we spoke to him,
translation.zh: 但当时 在我们盘问过他之后

translation.en: the income tax authorities had raided his wife Sangeeta's house in Mumbai.
translation.zh: 税务机关突击搜查了他妻子桑吉塔在孟买的家

translation.en: They had found a fax from Azharuddin.
translation.zh: 他们发现了一份来自阿兹鲁丁的传真

translation.en: Surprisingly, he went home and wrote everything that he had told us
translation.zh: 出人意料的是他回家把对我们说过的一切

translation.en: and faxed them to his wife, Sangeeta Bijlani.
translation.zh: 都传真给了他的妻子桑吉塔比基拉尼

translation.en: Point-by-point,
translation.zh: 他逐一罗列了

translation.en: he listed all the various things that he had told us.
translation.zh: 先前告诉我们的各种信息

translation.en: For example, the introduction to M.K by Ajay Sharma.
translation.zh: 比如说 阿杰沙玛介绍他认识了MK

translation.en: He had also written in the fax about his shopping spree in Harrods.
translation.zh: （他们甚至看见我在哈洛德购物） 传真中甚至提到了他在哈洛德百货疯狂购物

translation.en: That bill had been paid by one of the bookies.
translation.zh: 账单是其中一名庄家支付的

translation.en: So that corroborated that, you know,
translation.zh: 这证明阿兹鲁丁确实

translation.en: Azharuddin indeed had told all that things to us.
translation.zh: 向我们承认过所有那些事情

translation.en: He has been consistent all throughout
translation.zh: 他的表述从头到尾都是一致的

translation.en: in saying that he was not involved in match-fixing,
translation.zh: 他坚称自己没有造假

translation.en: and any confession before a police officer is essentially under pressure.
translation.zh: 在警察面前“招认”的一切其实都是迫于压力

translation.en: We were quite certain that he was involved.
translation.zh: 我们很确定他参与了造假

translation.en: Left no room for any doubt.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问

translation.en: [interviewer] These allegations came and just ended your career abruptly.
translation.zh: 这些造假指控突然从天而降终结了你的事业

translation.en: How did you cope with that? What did you do?
translation.zh: 你如何应对？你是怎么做的？

translation.en: Infinite patience. That's the only thing you can have.
translation.zh: 保持无尽的耐心 这是我唯一能做的

translation.en: I mean, if anybody possesses that, infinite patience,
translation.zh: 我认为只要具备无限的耐心

translation.en: I think they'll always come out successful.
translation.zh: 总会取得最终的胜利

translation.en: -Thank you for being on the couch with me. -My pleasure.
translation.zh: -谢谢你跟我一起坐在沙发上谈话-我很荣幸

translation.en: Although not answering all the questions that honestly.
translation.zh: 虽然你并未坦诚回答我的所有问题

translation.en: Maybe next time.
translation.zh: 也许下次吧

translation.en: -We should have another couch with you. -Maybe next time…
translation.zh: -我们应该再来一次沙发访谈-也许下次…

translation.en: [Ugra] Once Mohammed Azharuddin was banned,
translation.zh: 穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁被禁赛后

translation.en: there was a kind of a… "Let's move on. Let's move ahead from here."
translation.zh: 业内弥漫着一种氛围…“我们向前看吧 继续出发”

translation.en: The CBI report had a huge impact. It changed cricket.
translation.zh: 中央调查局的报告影响巨大改变了整个板球界 （需采取重大整顿措施）

translation.en: The main thing that we were able to do
translation.zh: 我们能做的主要就是

translation.en: was start this process of educating players.
translation.zh: 开始对球员进行教育

translation.en: Now they are told of the dangers lurking around them.
translation.zh: 告诉他们周围潜伏着许多危险

translation.en: How you can be cultivated, how you can be trapped.
translation.zh: 恶势力会如何培养你然后威逼利诱你

translation.en: So they can avoid getting corrupted.
translation.zh: 以此防止他们腐败堕落

translation.en: [bookie on tape, in Hindi] Today anti-corruption is everywhere.
translation.zh: 如今反腐行动无处不在 （匿名庄家的声音）

translation.en: An anti-corruption team stay in the hotel with the players.
translation.zh: 会有反腐小组跟球员待在同一家宾馆

translation.en: Even if one is able to get the players' phone numbers,
translation.zh: 即使有庄家设法拿到了球员的电话号码

translation.en: anti-corruption have an eye all over.
translation.zh: 也很难逃避反腐小组的全程监督

translation.en: But gambling is still big.
translation.zh: 但赌博仍然盛行

translation.en: No one can leave it.
translation.zh: 没有人能彻底放弃

translation.en: I have never even tried.
translation.zh: 我从来没试过放弃

translation.en: This is my job.
translation.zh: 这是我的工作

translation.en: [Ugra] When I look back at that time,
translation.zh: 回顾那段时光 我认为

translation.en: it was almost like growing up.
translation.zh: 那是我们的成长年代

translation.en: [chuckles] In sports journalism, it's like saying, "Wake up."
translation.zh: 那次事件给体育新闻界敲响了警钟

translation.en: Getting a slap on your fae and saying, "Wake up. This is what real life is like."
translation.zh: 就好像扇了你一耳光 对你说 “醒醒吧 这才是真实的生活”

translation.en: And so, for me, the superstars have gone away and faded,
translation.zh: 所以 对我而言那些超级明星的光环已经褪色消失

translation.en: but what I love is being part of the cricket community.
translation.zh: 但我依然享受身为球迷圈的一份子

translation.en: Being part of the family.
translation.zh: 身为板球大家庭的一员

translation.en: It always comes back to cricket,
translation.zh: 板球是我们无法割舍的爱

translation.en: because it can just set you alight with a piece of action
translation.zh: 只要球场上的一个动作就能点燃你的激情

translation.en: that you can't find in any other sport.
translation.zh: 这是任何其他运动都不能比拟的

translation.en: [commentator] Gone! Off stump…
translation.zh: 出局！击落远桩柱…

translation.en: Unbelievable performance from India.
translation.zh: 印度队不可思议的出色表现

translation.en: [in Hindi] I will not be taking any further legal action.
translation.zh: 我不会再采取进一步的法律行动

translation.en: I'm very happy with the court's decision.
translation.zh: 我对法庭的判决非常满意

translation.en: [in English] Uh, the case was overturned only on account of technical reasons.
translation.zh: 他能够翻案 纯粹是出于技术原因

translation.en: We, in CBI, are absolutely certain
translation.zh: 我们中央调查局内部人员都十分笃定

translation.en: that Mr. Mohammed Azharuddin was involved in match-fixing.
translation.zh: 穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁先生参与了造假

translation.en: And we said it with lot of evidence available at hand.
translation.zh: 我们是在掌握大量证据之后得出的这一结论

translation.en: [in Hindi] I want to do something in cricket
translation.zh: 要说有什么打算 我想为板球做点贡献因为我打了那么多年的球

translation.en: because I have played so many years.
translation.zh: 我想为板球做点贡献因为我打了那么多年的球

translation.en: I would want to share my experience
translation.zh: 我想和年轻一代的球员们

translation.en: with the young generation of cricketers.
translation.zh: 分享自己的经验

translation.en: [reporter] Azhar, uh…
translation.zh: 阿兹鲁丁…

translation.en: [in Hindi] The board is ill-informed,
translation.zh: 委员会被误导了

translation.en: and I'm disappointed by its decision,
translation.zh: 我对他们的决定很失望

translation.en: which I feel is arbitrary and discriminatory.
translation.zh: 我认为这一决定不仅武断 而且有失偏颇

translation.en: [in English] I do not think that M.K had any remorse as such.
translation.zh: 我并不认为MK有任何悔意

translation.en: He had made enough money
translation.zh: 他已经赚够了钱

translation.en: and, uh, that it was time for him to,
translation.zh: 正好适时收手

translation.en: uh, shall we say, enjoy his earnings.
translation.zh: 好好享受他的收入

translation.en: Now I can go back and sleep properly.
translation.zh: 现在我终于能回去睡个安稳觉了

translation.en: Nothing… Leave it to the government agencies.
translation.zh: 没什么…就把一切交给政府解决吧

translation.en: The allegation made by Manoj Prabhakar against Kapil Dev
translation.zh: 马诺吉普拉哈克对卡皮尔戴弗的指控

translation.en: were not corroborated by any kind of evidence.
translation.zh: 并无任何佐证

translation.en: The nation's spirit would have broken if they found Kapil Dev was involved.
translation.zh: （可谓没有任何确凿的证据） 若发现卡皮尔戴弗也参与了造假整个国家的精神都会遭受重创

translation.en: And to that extent, I think everybody was very relieved
translation.zh: 所以从那个角度来说 他没有参与

translation.en: that he's not involved.
translation.zh: 我认为大家都松了一口气

translation.en: [man, in Hindi] Get the car!
translation.zh: 去开车！

translation.en: [Sawani, in English] When Mukesh Gupta revealed
translation.zh: 当穆凯什古普塔开始透露

translation.en: that he had dealings with Manoj Prabhakar also,
translation.zh: 他也跟马诺吉普拉哈克做过交易

translation.en: that… the entire tables turned.
translation.zh: 那…彻底扭转了局面

translation.en: Perhaps he may not have been as bold in taking part in the sting operations
translation.zh: 要是他早知道参与钓鱼行动会导致他自己的罪行败露

translation.en: if he had ever known that he himself will be exposed.
translation.zh: 也许马诺吉就不会有胆量那么做了

translation.en: [in Hindi] I never expected that this thing would end this way.
translation.zh: 我从来没想到事情会以这种方式结束

translation.en: I was the one who originally exposed this in front of the public.
translation.zh: 我是最先在公众面前揭发此事的人

translation.en: If I was involved, I would never have started it.
translation.zh: 如果我打过假球根本不会把这事捅出来

translation.en: [Bahal] We don't know the extent, if at all,
translation.zh: 我们并不确定马诺吉

translation.en: of Manoj's involvement in the match-fixing saga.
translation.zh: 是否参与了造假、参与度有多深

translation.en: We did ask him, we did confront him, but he denied everything to us.
translation.zh: 我们问过他 当面问过但他全盘否认了

translation.en: You could say that Manoj Prabhakar
translation.zh: 你可以说马诺吉普拉哈克

translation.en: was possibly the most gutsy or the most foolish.
translation.zh: 是最勇敢无畏的人也可以说他愚蠢至极

translation.en: You know, in that sense, to me, it was enormously gutsy.
translation.zh: 在这件事情上 我认为他非常勇敢
